transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan good morning.
Executive: Hi sir good morning. Bhumika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART ke office se.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Ji ji sir kal aapka call aaya tha please bataiye.
Customer: Mam mere paas ek customer ka jo hai regular kya bolte hai wo complaint kiye ja raha hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: New nayi ID se. Halaki mere paas uska sara material ja chuka hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Aur main matlab bahar gaya hua tha accident vagera ho gaya tha mera to us vajah se main dekh nahi paya tha.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Kuch din main company se dekha hoga aapne main leads vagera kuch bhi wo nahi kar raha.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: To mera matlab main unka call receive nahi kar pa raha tha. To baad mein maine unse bola bhi tha uske baad meri baat hui unse to wo badtameezi karne laga bahut jyada.
Executive: Kya bol rahe hai?
Customer: Matlab wahi gali galoch kar raha tha.
Executive: Achcha okay.
Customer: Ji aur uski aur maine bol diya bhai tujhse jo ho jaye jo kar sake tu kar le jab mere paas se material ja chuka hai aur mere paas proof hai is cheez ka wo jhoot bol raha hai ki mere paas material nahi pahucha.
Executive: Achcha aapke hisab se wo material unke paas pahunch chuka hai?
Customer: Mam deliver ho gaya hai main aapko.
Executive: Deliver ho gaya hai okay.
Customer: Ji ji. Main aapko wo bhi de dunga kya bolte hai mere paas uska proof hai.
Executive: Tracking details vagera.
Customer: Haan tracking kafi din pehle deliver ho chuka hai material lekin wo jhoot bol raha hai ki mere paas pura material nahi pahuncha aur material hi nahi pahuncha pehle to bol raha tha ki pura nahi pahuncha ab bol raha hai ki material hi nahi pahuncha.
Executive: Achcha okay. Buyer ka naam?
Customer: Ajay.
Executive: Ajay Goregaon.
Customer: Aur wo nayi nayi Itaniket.
Executive: Achcha okay yahan pe unka location Goregaon ka dikha raha hai. Unka ek complaint bhi yahan pe pada hua hai 14 November ka dala hua hai yahan pe complaint uska. Aur complaint hai inka ki achcha inhone I am Ajay Bisht I am international medium in a detail my website. Achcha okay. Thik hai aapke hisab se sir ye material deliver ho chuka hai na unko?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye inhone likha hai ki theek hai uska quotation and check this profile on IndiaMART review. Inhone review bhi diya hai aapko.
Customer: Mam wahi to inme ye matlab ye hai ya jo bhi hai main jin bando ne mujhse koi material bhi nahi kharida unke bhi report aa rahe hai bewajah. Ab IndiaMART pe agar aisa hoga to bhai hum to kam kar nahi payenge.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo aapki baat thik hai. To ye sir ye jo buyer hai aur pehle bhi ticket aaya tha ye same hai kya dono person?
Customer: Matlab abhi to ek alag naam se wo alag hai na.
Executive: Same nahi hai ye alag hai.
Executive: Thik hai aap bol rahe ho ki review alag alag logo se aa rahe hai ye jo teen char review aaye hai ye ek hi ke hai?
Customer: Ye to mujhe nahi pata lekin 14 15 16 matlab inme se kisi ne bhi mujhse koi matlab mera pehle koi contact nahi hua na koi material buy kiya inhone.
Executive: To aap ek kam kariye sir ye jo ye jo kyuki abhi recently mein 14 se leke aap aaj teen do do din mein hi panch panch ha total panch review aaye hai one one star ke right to aap bol rahe ho ki aapke sirf Ajay iske sath baat ho rahi hai do Ajay ke naam se hai reviews aur baki teen Amit Sandeep aur ek IndiaMART buyer naam se hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aap bol rahe ho ki IndiaMART buyer Amit aur Sandeep ke sath koi bhi discussion bhi nahi hua hai aur still unhone rate kar diya hai aapko right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aap ek kam kariye sir aap na mere ko in teeno ki chat ka ek to screenshot dal dijiye starting se leke end tak ka thik hai aur jo Ajay wala buyer hai uska jo tracking details hai ek bar aap mujhe forward kar dijiye.
Customer: Okay mam send details.
Executive: Aur jo bhi matlab ha boliye.
Customer: Matlab inka sabka screenshot dena hai aapko aur uska tracking detail dena hai.
Executive: Haan sir kyuki uski unki chat ka ek bar screenshot main dekh lungi na to main apni team ko wo forward kar sakti hu baki ye jo Ajay buyer hai aapka inka jo bhi mandatory detail aap mujhe de sakte ho for the proof ki unka material dispatch ho matlab unke paas pahunch chuka hai deliver ho gaya hai wo aap mujhe bhej dijiye. Product pura deliver hua hai na sir aapka?
Customer: Mam mere paas se do bar do bar ja chuka hai inka material matlab chala gaya tha Diwali se pehle gaya tha.
Executive: Achcha alag alag gaya tha.
Executive: Okay. Diwali se pehle gaya tha maine na tracking detail de di thi uske baad bhi ye regular call kare ja rahe the aur foran hi inhone complaint kar di thi tabhi ke tabhi.
Executive: Achcha aur amount tha 21472 right?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Thik hai aap inkyuki ye to yahan pe refund ke liye aur aapke profile ke removal ke liye request dali hai inhone.
Customer: Mam.
Executive: Koi baat nahi aap mujhe details forward kariye main ek bar apni legal team ko forward kar deti hu wo.
Customer: Okay mam.
Executive: Thik hai abhi bhej dena sir hai na turant hi. Screenshot teeno buyer ke. Haan isi number pe bhej do ya ruko main aapko whatsapp dal deti hu.
Customer: Aap mujhe whatsapp kar dijiye main bhejta hu aapko.
Executive: Mere paas aapke na do number hai. Dekhna maine abhi hi dala hai ek bar ye check kar lo isi pe hi dal dena thik hai.
Customer: Yes mam aa gaya.
Executive: Thik hai baki sir isse related koi aur concern to nahi raha isiliye call kiya tha na aapne mujhe?
Customer: Haan maine isiliye call kiya tha pata nahi kaun log hai bewajah complaint kiye ja rahe hai do teen din ho gaye.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir koi baat nahi ek bar main check kar leti hu aap mujhe details forward kar do thik hai aur aapka shayad customer care pe bhi ek ticket open ho gaya tha wo bhi main close kar dungi abhi. Pehle aap mujhe details forward kar dena.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Thik hai sir main details share karta hu. Haan okay okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving complaints from a buyer.

- Buyer claims material not received, uses abusive language.

- Customer received negative reviews from unknown people.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for screenshots of chats.

- Executive asked for tracking details of the buyer.

- Executive will forward details to the legal team.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to send screenshots and tracking details.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, complaints, reviews, tracking
